paper_abstract: We study the notion of n-folds H-ideals in BCI-algebras as a natural generalization of H-ideals in BCI-algebras. Thanks to the concept of fuzzy point, we give some properties of n-folds and fuzzy n-folds H-ideals. Finally, we establish some algorithms for study of foldness theory of H-ideals in BCI-algebras.
paper_title: Computational methods for study of foldness of H-ideals in BCI-algebras
